conversation.content:
所以当时就是这样，我把Jake Henderson从泳池里拉了出来。[confused] 就是那个Jake Henderson，你知道吧，sophomore year每天都把我塞进储物柜的那个。[pause] 然后现在——天哪，这太诡异了——他现在居然说我是英雄？[bitter] 他妈妈真的给我寄了一张感谢卡。[laugh] 就是那种，呃，实体的卡片，through the mail那种，说我是个"天使"，说他们"永远感激"。

[anxious] 我一直在想他以前是怎么... 嗯，他以前总说我参加游泳队很"可悲"。[angry] 说我看起来像条快死的鱼！And his friends would all laugh, 你知道吗？[sad] 每次训练，他们都会在那里，呃... 对我发出那种溺水的声音。

[confused] 但是在那个party上他沉下去的时候，所有人都愣住了。[quickly] 真的，所有人就站在那里用手机拍，然后我就——我都没想，I just jumped in。[sigh] 可能就是肌肉记忆什么的吧。

[hesitantly] 现在他们都想跟我做朋友？[sarcastic] 哦，突然间我就值得他们搭理了。[upset] Rachel居然邀请我下周去她的生日party——那个装了3年没看见我的Rachel！

[very quietly] 最糟糕的是... 我觉得我可能真的会去。[confused] 这是不是很可悲啊？I saved someone's life，但我还是，就是... 还是想要他们的认可？[frustrated] 啊，我恨死这种感觉了。

original_conversation.content:
So there I was, pulling Jake Henderson out of the pool. [confused] The same Jake Henderson who used to shove me into lockers every single day sophomore year. [pause] And now—God, this is so weird—now he's calling me a hero? [bitter] His mom literally sent me a thank you card. [laugh] Like an actual, physical card in the mail saying I'm "an angel" and they're "forever grateful."

[anxious] I keep thinking about how he used to... um, he used to call me "pathetic" for being on the swim team. [angry] Said I looked like a dying fish! And his friends would all laugh, you know? [sad] Every single practice, they'd be there making those, uh... those drowning noises at me. 

[confused] But when he went under at that party, everyone just froze. [quickly] Literally everyone just stood there filming with their phones, and I just—I didn't even think about it, I just jumped in. [sigh] Maybe it's muscle memory or whatever.

[hesitantly] Now they all want to be friends? [sarcastic] Oh, suddenly I'm worth talking to. [upset] Rachel actually invited me to her birthday thing next week—Rachel who pretended I was invisible for three years! 

[very quietly] The really messed up part is... I think I might actually go. [confused] Is that pathetic? I saved someone's life and I'm still, like... still wanting their approval somehow? [frustrated] Ugh, I hate this.

subject: Your unlikely hero moment getting you recognition from the same people who used to bully you
